class.name: ResourceImporterSVG
class.brief_description: Imports an SVG file as an automatically scalable texture for use in UI elements and 2D rendering.
class.description: This importer imports [DPITexture] resources. See also [ResourceImporterTexture] and [ResourceImporterImage].

members.member: Texture scale. [code]1.0[/code] is the original SVG size. Higher values result in a larger image.
If set, remaps texture colors according to [Color]-[Color] map.
If [code]true[/code], uses lossless compression for the SVG source.
